content: Great question! It all should start with what your goal are, then you can prioritize from there. If your goal is to get as many pre-signups as possible, then start implementing things that will provide you with immediate traction. If your goal is to have a huge launch, start building out things that will take longer to show results. This list is more of an ‘everything you could do’ rather than an ‘everything your need to do’ compilation. Just start with your goals and then begin picking some channels that will help you reach those goals.
